title: Let the Other 95% of Great Programmers In
title_zh: 让美国以外的95%的优秀程序员进入美国
summary_en: This insightful essay argues that American technology companies' push for easier immigration is justified by the global distribution of exceptional programming talent. The author contends that only 5% of the world's great programmers are born in the US, making immigration essential to maintain technological leadership. The piece highlights the qualitative difference between competent and exceptional programmers, noting that exceptional talent can't be trained but must be nurtured. The author warns that failing to attract top global talent could lead to a brain drain, with the best programmers potentially concentrating in other hubs. The article combines economic reasoning with a passionate plea for policy change, emphasizing that this is an opportunity that costs nothing to seize.
summary_zh: 美国技术公司呼吁简化移民程序，本文从全球优秀程序员分布的角度深入分析了这一现象。作者指出，仅5%的顶尖程序员出生于美国，移民是保持技术领先地位的关键。文中强调优秀程序员与普通程序员的质的差异，认为这种天赋无法通过培训获得。作者警告，若无法吸引全球顶尖人才，可能导致人才流失，优秀程序员集中于其他中心。这篇文章以经济分析为基础，结合激情洋溢的政策倡议，强调这是一个几乎不需要成本的机会。
best_quote_en: The US has less than 5% of the world's population. Which means if the qualities that make someone a great programmer are evenly distributed, 95% of great programmers are born outside the US.
best_quote_zh: 美国拥有全球不到5%的人口。这意味着如果构成优秀程序员的特质均匀分布，那么95%的优秀程序员出生在国外。

title: Rainbows, fractals, and crumpled paper: Hölder continuity
title_zh: 彩虹、分形与皱纸：Hölder连续性
summary_en: This exploration of space-filling curves and color mapping reveals fascinating mathematical connections between dimensions. The author examines the challenge of creating smooth transitions between color spaces using bijections, with particular focus on the Hölder continuity of such mappings. The discussion of the Hilbert curve as a solution for the 2D-to-1D case provides insight into fractal dimensions and their applications. The piece bridges abstract mathematics with practical visualizations like allRGB images, offering a unique perspective on how mathematical theory can solve real-world problems in image processing and data visualization.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了空间填充曲线与色彩映射之间的数学联系，揭示了维度转换的奥秘。作者通过分析色彩空间的平滑过渡问题，重点研究了Hölder连续性映射。对于二维到一维的映射问题，希尔伯特曲线提供了一个完美的解决方案，展示了分形维度的应用。这篇文章将抽象的数学理论与实际的图像处理问题结合，展现了数学如何解决现实世界的挑战。
best_quote_en: The Hilbert curve has the nice property that an interval of length r of the unit interval gets mapped to a reasonably compact region of area r in the square, which has a diameter on the order of √r.
best_quote_zh: 希尔伯特曲线有一个很好的性质，即单位区间内长度为r的区间会被映射到正方形内面积为r的相当紧凑区域，其直径约为√r。

title: Joachim Trier Has Put Oslo on the Cinematic Map
title_zh: 约阿希姆·特里尔让奥斯陆在电影地图上占据一席之地
summary_en: This profile of Joachim Trier offers a deep dive into the Norwegian director's unique approach to filmmaking and his profound connection with his hometown of Oslo. The article highlights Trier's empathetic directing style, his preference for intimate character studies, and his ability to capture the melancholic beauty of Oslo as a character in its own right. The piece explores Trier's recurring themes of depression, familial relationships, and the transience of human life, as seen in his latest film 'Sentimental Value' and his previous works like 'The Worst Person in the World'. The article also delves into Trier's personal background, his collaborative relationships with actors and co-writer Eskil Vogt, and his distinctive aesthetic influenced by his skateboarding background and cinematic influences. It's a thoughtful examination of an artist who blends personal introspection with universal themes, making his films resonate with audiences worldwide.
summary_zh: 约阿希姆·特里尔的独特导演风格和他与故乡奥斯陆深厚的情感联系。文章突出了特里尔富有同情心的导演风格，他对亲密角色研究的偏好，以及他能够将奥斯陆的忧郁之美拍摄成影片中一个独特的角色。该文探讨了特里尔在其最新电影《情感价值》和之前的作品如《世界上最差劲的人》中反复出现的主题：抑郁、家庭关系以及人类生命的短暂性。文章还深入挖掘了特里尔的个人背景，他与演员和合作编剧埃斯基尔·沃格特之间的协作关系，以及受他的滑板背景和电影影响而形成的独特美学。这是对一个将个人内省与普遍主题相结合的艺术家的深刻探讨，使他的电影能够引起全球观众的共鸣。
best_quote_en: People work better that way—at least, the people I want to work with.
best_quote_zh: 人们这样工作效率更高——至少，这是我喜欢与之合作的人。

title: Podcast Magic/Snap-on phone charger/OpenWebcam Database
title_zh: 播客魔法/手机磁吸充电器/开放网络摄像头数据库
summary_en: This collection of recommendations showcases clever solutions to everyday problems, blending practicality with innovation. Podcast Magic offers a simple way to capture and transcribe podcast moments without complex setups, appealing to audio content consumers who value efficiency. The Anker 621 MagGo charger solves the traveler's dilemma of managing cables and portable power, demonstrating how magnetic technology can enhance convenience. The OpenWebcam Database provides a fascinating window into global daily life, serving as both a productivity reset tool and a source of cultural connection. These recommendations highlight the intersection of technology and human needs, offering both immediate utility and deeper engagement with the world.
summary_zh: 这些推荐展示了解决日常问题的巧妙方案，兼具实用性与创新性。播客魔法提供了不需要复杂设置的录制和转录功能，吸引了重视效率的音频内容消费者。安克621 MagGo充电器解决了旅行者管理电缆和便携电源的困境，展示了磁力技术如何提升便利性。开放网络摄像头数据库为全球日常生活提供了令人着迷的窗口，既是提高效率的工具，也是文化连接的源泉。这些推荐凸显了技术与人类需求的交汇点，既提供即时实用性，又带来更深层次的世界观。
best_quote_en: This slim 5,000mAh power bank magnetically snaps to newer iPhones. No more fumbling with cables and separate battery packs.
best_quote_zh: 这个薄型5000mAh电池组可以磁吸到新款iPhone上。不再需要摸索电缆和单独的电池包。

title: Jess Cartner-Morley on fashion: introducing the twinset 2.0 – where practicality meets panache
title_zh: 杰斯·卡特纳-莫利关于时尚：介绍双套装2.0——实用与优雅并存
summary_en: Jess Cartner-Morley's piece on the resurgence of the twinset offers a fascinating exploration of how fashion trends evolve while maintaining their core appeal. The 'twinset 2.0' represents a modern interpretation of the classic matched sweater and cardigan set, embracing layering, texture, and a more casual aesthetic. This trend speaks to our collective desire for comfort without sacrificing style, reflecting a post-pandemic shift towards polished yet approachable fashion. The analysis highlights how fashion can reinvent traditional elements, making them relevant to contemporary sensibilities while offering practical benefits like added warmth and visual interest. The piece also touches on the democratic nature of this trend, requiring no new purchases but simply creative styling of existing knitwear.
summary_zh: 杰斯·卡特纳-莫利的文章探讨了双套装复兴的现象，展现了时尚趋势如何在保持核心魅力的同时不断演变。新版双套装将传统的毛衣与针织衫搭配升级为时尚层叠，强调质感与随性风格。这一趋势反映了人们对舒适与时尚并重的渴望，体现了疫情后对休闲却不失精致的审美追求。分析指出时尚如何赋予传统元素新生，既符合当代审美又提供实用价值，如保暖和视觉层次感。文中还提到这股风潮不需新购置衣物，仅需巧妙搭配现有针织品，展现了时尚的包容性与创造力。
best_quote_en: The new twinset is a way to experiment with texture, proportion and colour
best_quote_zh: 新版双套装为质感、比例和色彩的实验提供了途径

title: How to Be an Expert in a Changing World
title_zh: 在变化的世界中如何成为专家
summary_en: This essay explores the challenge of maintaining expertise in a rapidly changing world. The author argues that traditional expertise can become obsolete as conditions evolve, and offers strategies from startup investing to stay adaptable. Key insights include: (1) Actively seek change rather than assuming static conditions, (2) Cultivate aggressive open-mindedness and sensitivity to emerging trends, (3) Focus on people rather than just ideas when evaluating potential, and (4) Surround yourself with innovative individuals. The piece blends practical advice with philosophical reflection on knowledge and belief systems, offering valuable perspective for professionals across fields.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了在快速变化的世界中保持专业知识的挑战。作者认为，随着条件变化，传统专业知识可能变得过时，并提出了从创业投资中得到的保持适应力的策略。核心观点包括：(1) 主动寻找变化而非假设静态条件，(2) 培养开放包容的心态和对新趋势的敏感度，(3) 在评估潜力时更关注人而非仅仅是想法，(4) 与创新人士为伍。文章将实用建议与对知识和信念体系的哲学思考相结合，为各领域专业人士提供了宝贵的视角。
best_quote_en: The way to come up with new ideas is not to try explicitly to, but to try to solve problems and simply not discount weird hunches you have in the process.
best_quote_zh: 产生新想法的方式不是刻意尝试，而是解决问题时不要忽略那些奇怪的直觉。

title: Geometric UDT
title_zh: 几何UDT
summary_en: This thought-provoking essay explores the intersection of updateless decision theory (UDT) and value learning in artificial superintelligence. The author presents 'Geometric UDT,' a novel approach combining Nash bargaining with UDT to address challenges in value learning while maintaining reflective consistency. The core insight is that traditional UDT struggles with 'nosy neighbor' utility functions that consider outcomes across hypothetical worlds. Geometric UDT proposes a bargaining framework between value hypotheses, using an updateful policy as a baseline to ensure fairness. The analysis reveals important implications for AI alignment, particularly how to handle value uncertainty without sacrificing optimal decision-making. The essay's technical depth and interdisciplinary approach make it valuable for researchers in AI ethics and decision theory.
summary_zh: 这篇文章深入探讨了无更新决策理论（UDT）与价值学习在人工超级智能中的结合。作者提出了“几何UDT”，通过将纳什协商解与UDT结合，解决价值学习中遇到的反射一致性问题。核心观点是传统UDT难以处理“窥探邻居”效应，即价值函数跨多个假设世界考虑结果。几何UDT建议通过假设之间的协商解决方案，以更新型政策为基准保证公平性。分析揭示了人工智能对齐领域的重要启示，特别是如何在保持最优决策的同时处理价值不确定性。文章的技术深度和跨学科方法使其成为AI伦理与决策理论研究者的重要参考。
best_quote_en: Geometric UDT advises us to use a fair prior (in the Nash Bargaining Solution sense) instead of our honest prior. The honest prior has a chance of completely screwing over humans (completely ignoring the correct value-hypothesis even in the face of overwhelming evidence), whereas the fair prior does not.
best_quote_zh: 几何UDT建议我们使用公平先验（在纳什协商解的意义上）而不是我们的真实先验。真实先验有可能完全忽略正确的价值假设（即使面对压倒性的证据），而公平先验则不会。

title: What the Democrats’ Good Night Means for 2026 and Beyond
title_zh: 民主党在2025年的大胜意味着什么？
summary_en: The 2025 election results reveal significant insights about the shifting political landscape. Democrats outperformed expectations in key races, suggesting that their strategy of focusing on economic issues and moderation resonated with voters. The analysis highlights the polarization of the electorate and the challenges Republicans face without Trump on the ballot. The discussion also touches on the structural advantages Democrats hold in off-year elections and the potential implications for future races, including the 2028 presidential election. The interview with Sean Trende, a senior elections analyst, provides a nuanced perspective on voter behavior and party strategies, emphasizing the importance of turnout over persuasion in a highly polarized environment.
summary_zh: 2025年的选举结果揭示了政治格局的显著变化。民主党在关键选举中超出预期，表明其聚焦经济议题和温和路线的策略赢得了选民支持。分析指出选民极化加剧，共和党在特朗普缺席情况下面临挑战。讨论还涉及民主党在非大选年中的结构性优势及未来选举的潜在影响，包括2028年总统大选。与选举分析师肖恩·特伦德的访谈，提供了关于选民行为和政党策略的深入见解，强调在高度极化的环境中，动员选民比说服选民更为重要。
best_quote_en: Elections are referenda on the party in power. People's dislike of some things that Democrats believe and do might be a problem for governing when Democrats win, but I don’t think it’s a problem for elections.
best_quote_zh: 选举是对执政党的公投。人们对民主党的一些信念和行为的不满，可能在民主党赢得选举后成为治理的问题，但我认为这并不影响选举结果。

title: Free Press / Building Stories
title_zh: 自由媒体 / 建筑故事
summary_en: This content presents two distinct creative works that explore different aspects of storytelling and visual communication. The first, 'Free Press,' is a visual history of underground newspapers from 1965-1975, showcasing how counterculture movements used alternative media to challenge societal norms and promote progressive ideas. The book serves as both a historical document and a design reference, highlighting the raw energy and experimental nature of the era's underground press. The second work, 'Building Stories,' is Chris Ware's magnum opus that deconstructs traditional comic storytelling through its innovative physical presentation and exploration of human struggle. Both works demonstrate how media can be used to challenge conventions and connect with audiences on deeper emotional levels.
summary_zh: 本内容介绍了两部探索叙事与视觉传达的艺术作品。第一部《自由媒体》是1965-1975年地下报纸的视觉史，展示了反文化运动如何通过替代媒体挑战社会规范，推动进步理念。这本书既是历史文献，也是设计参考，凸显了那个时代地下媒体的原始能量与实验精神。第二部《建筑故事》是克里斯·韦尔的代表作，通过创新的物理呈现方式和对人类困境的探索，颠覆了传统漫画叙事。两部作品都展示了媒体如何挑战常规，在更深层次上与受众产生共鸣。
best_quote_en: When I was designing bOING bOING (the late 1980s/early 1990s zine) I was inspired by the precious few samples of The East Village Other, The Realist, and The Gothic Blimp Works that I could find in used bookstores.
best_quote_zh: 当我在设计《嘟嘟声》（20世纪80年代末/90年代初的杂志）时，我从旧书店中能找到的《东村他报》《现实主义者》和《哥特气球工厂》的寥寥几份样本中获得了灵感。

title: Single mothers in China find a new kind of partner – other single mothers
title_zh: 中国单亲妈妈找到新伴侣——其他单亲妈妈
summary_en: This article explores an emerging social trend in China where single mothers are forming cohabitation arrangements with other single mothers to share childcare responsibilities and living costs. The piece highlights the practical benefits of these arrangements, including emotional support and shared household management, while also acknowledging the societal challenges and lack of formal legal protections. The story is framed through personal narratives of women who have successfully navigated these relationships, offering a nuanced look at how economic pressures and changing social dynamics are reshaping family structures in China. The article raises important questions about state welfare provisions and the evolving perception of single-parent families in a society traditionally rooted in conventional family values.
summary_zh: 中国单身母亲在经济压力和社会变迁下，开始尝试与同类人共同生活，分担抚养孩子的责任和生活成本。这篇文章通过真实案例展现了这种新型家庭模式带来的实际益处，同时也揭示了社会对单亲母亲的偏见和国家福利体系的不足。当前社会对离婚和单亲家庭的看法正在逐渐改变，但传统家庭价值观仍在农村地区根深蒂固。这种非正式的共居安排既有成功案例，也存在挑战，反映了中国家庭结构正在经历的深刻变革。
best_quote_en: 'At the core, we both know very clearly why we’re together – it’s about sharing and managing the risks and pressures of life.'
best_quote_zh: 我们核心的原因就是分享和应对生活中的风险与压力。

title: How You Know
title_zh: 你是如何知道的
summary_en: The essay explores the persistent impact of reading and experiences on our mental models, even when we forget the specific details. The author shares the insight that knowledge is 'compiled' into our understanding, much like a program's source code is compiled into executable form. This realization transforms the act of rereading from a sign of failure to a valuable practice, as our evolving perspectives allow us to extract new insights from familiar material. The piece also speculates about future technologies that might enable us to relive and edit experiences, potentially changing our relationship with knowledge retention. The core insight challenges our anxiety about forgetting and offers a more nuanced view of learning and memory.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了阅读和经历如何持久地影响我们的认知模型，即使我们忘记了具体细节。作者分享了知识被“编译”到我们理解中的见解，就像程序的源代码被编译成可执行文件。这一认识将重读从失败的标志转变为有价值的实践，因为我们不断变化的视角使我们能从熟悉的材料中获取新的见解。文章还推测未来的技术可能使我们能够重新体验并编辑经历，从而可能改变我们对知识保留的关系。核心观点挑战了我们对遗忘的焦虑，并提供了一个更复杂的学习和记忆的观点。
best_quote_en: A perfect formulation of a problem is already half its solution.
best_quote_zh: 一个问题的完美表述已经是解决它的一半。

title: Did you know you can just buy blackbelts?
title_zh: 你知道吗？你可以直接购买黑带？
summary_en: The article explores the concept of superficial achievement through loopholes and shortcuts, using the metaphor of buying black belts as a symbol of misplaced effort. The author critiques instances where people exploit system gaps for personal gain without achieving the actual goals, such as in calibration trivia games or educational settings. The core insight is the distinction between finding loopholes and genuinely achieving the intended outcome, emphasizing the importance of aligning actions with true objectives. The piece encourages deeper reflection on whether shortcuts truly serve one's goals or merely create illusory success.
summary_zh: 这篇文章通过购买黑带这一比喻，探讨了通过漏洞和捷径获得表面成就的现象。作者批评了人们在校准游戏、教育等场景中利用系统漏洞谋取私利却未达到真正目标的行为。核心观点在于区分发现漏洞与真正实现目标的区别，强调行动与真实目标的一致性。文章鼓励人们深入思考，捷径是否真正服务于自身目标，还是仅仅制造虚幻的成功。
best_quote_en: It's like going to the gym with a car jack and claiming you can lift five hundred pounds because you put the jack under the dumbell.
best_quote_zh: 这就像带着千斤顶去健身房，声称能举起五百磅，因为你把千斤顶放在哑铃下面。

title: America Begins Clapping Back at Donald Trump
title_zh: 美国开始对特朗普进行反击
summary_en: Susan B. Glasser's article examines the political backlash against Donald Trump as America begins to push back against his divisive leadership. The piece highlights Trump's brazen actions, from hosting a controversial Halloween party during a government shutdown to freezing critical infrastructure funding, which have sparked significant opposition. The recent election results, where Democrats won by wide margins, suggest growing voter dissatisfaction. Trump's typical response—blaming others and escalating conflicts—may no longer be effective as the political landscape shifts. The article also notes generational changes, with new leaders like Zohran Mamdani emerging, while figures like Dick Cheney and Nancy Pelosi symbolize the old guard. The piece ultimately questions whether this backlash is a temporary protest or a lasting repudiation of Trump's leadership.
summary_zh: 苏珊·B·格拉斯的文章分析了美国对特朗普领导力的反抗。特朗普在政府关门期间举办争议性派对并冻结关键基础设施资金等行为引发广泛反对。民主党在选举中获胜，显示选民不满情绪加深。特朗普的典型回应——甩锅和升级冲突，可能失效。文章还提到政治新生代崛起，而切尼和佩洛西等人物象征旧时代。这场反抗是暂时的抗议，还是对特朗普领导力的持久否定？
best_quote_en: The retirement of Nancy Pelosi is a great thing for America. She was evil, corrupt, and highly overrated. I’m very honored that she impeached me twice and failed miserably twice.
best_quote_zh: 佩洛西的退休对美国来说是好事。她邪恶、腐败且被高估。我非常荣幸她两次弹劾我却两次失败。

title: Better Travel Pillow/Set Jetting/Top Expat Countries
title_zh: 改善旅行体验：舒适枕头、必备洗漱包、热门旅行趋势与最佳侨居国
summary_en: This newsletter offers practical travel insights with a mix of personal recommendations and data-driven trends. The inflatable travel pillow review provides a clever solution to common airline comfort issues, demonstrating thoughtful product testing. The pre-packed toiletry kit tip showcases efficiency in travel preparation. The Expedia travel trends report highlights emerging destinations and new travel concepts like 'set jetting,' offering valuable market insights. The expat survey reveals Asia's growing appeal, particularly China, for its convenience. The content balances personal experience with broader industry trends, making it valuable for both casual travelers and those considering long-term relocation.
summary_zh: 这封新闻稿结合了个人旅行体验和数据驱动的趋势分析。可折叠旅行枕头的评测提供了解决航空旅行舒适度的实用方案，展现了产品测试的细致思考。预装洗漱包的建议体现了旅行准备的高效性。Expedia的旅行趋势报告揭示了新兴目的地和
best_quote_en: Convenience is a recurring theme, with expats across China raving about fast public transportation to efficient online shopping.
best_quote_zh: 便利性是一个反复出现的主题，中国各地的外籍人士纷纷赞赏快速的公共交通和高效的在线购物。

title: Party dressing’s most unexpected upgrade: the cocktail T-shirt
title_zh: 派对穿搭的意外升级：鸡尾酒T恤
summary_en: The cocktail T-shirt represents a fascinating evolution in party fashion, blending casual comfort with elegant sophistication. This trend challenges traditional notions of formal attire by offering a versatile, thermodynamically superior alternative to conventional party wear. The piece's understated elegance and practical benefits—like temperature regulation and better fit—reflect a growing consumer demand for multifunctional, sustainable fashion. The industry's embrace of this hybrid category, from luxury brands like Prada to high street retailers, signals a broader shift toward practical elegance in evening wear. The trend also addresses environmental concerns by potentially reducing overconsumption of single-use party garments. This innovation in knitwear demonstrates how fashion can adapt to both personal comfort and ethical considerations, making it a compelling development in contemporary style.
summary_zh: 鸡尾酒T恤将休闲舒适与优雅融为一体，挑战了正式着装的传统观念。这种趋势反映了消费者对多功能、可持续时尚的需求，同时解决了环境问题。从普拉达到高街品牌的普及，标志着晚装向实用优雅的转变。这一创新展示了时尚如何适应个人舒适与伦理考量，成为当代风格的重要发展。
best_quote_en: They have that sort of understated look that a T-shirt tends to give the wearer, but unlike the way a cotton T-shirt sort of unravels by midday, the knit has a more polished effect.
best_quote_zh: 它们给人一种低调的感觉，但与棉T恤不同，羊毛衫的针织材质能保持更精致的效果。

title: Rebels Post Videos of Mass Killings in Darfur as the World Watches
title_zh: 达尔富尔叛军发布大规模屠杀视频，世界袖手旁观
summary_en: This harrowing report details the systematic atrocities committed by the Rapid Support Forces (RSF) in Darfur, Sudan, following their capture of El Fasher. The article highlights the posting of graphic execution videos on social media, the strategic use of drones and artillery supplied by the UAE, and the construction of a berm to prevent humanitarian aid. Expert analysis from Yale's Humanitarian Research Lab reveals a pattern of mass killings visible from satellite imagery, with estimates of tens of thousands of deaths in just five days. The piece also explores the historical context of genocide in Darfur, the international community's inaction, and the complex geopolitical interests at play, particularly the UAE's involvement in arming the RSF. The report underscores the urgent need for global intervention to prevent further atrocities and the potential for escalation in Tawila.
summary_zh: 本文揭露了苏丹达尔富尔地区快速支持部队（RSF）在攻占埃尔法舍尔后的系统性暴行。报道指出，RSF在社交媒体上发布了血腥的处决视频，并利用阿联酋提供的无人机和炮兵设备围困城市，阻止人道主义援助。耶鲁人道主义研究实验室的专家分析卫星图像发现，RSF在短短五天内可能造成数万人死亡。文章还探讨了达尔富尔历史上的种族灭绝背景、国际社会的漠视以及阿联酋支持RSF的复杂地缘政治因素。报道强调了迫切需要国际干预以阻止进一步暴行，并警惕塔维拉地区可能面临的升级风险。
best_quote_en: "The world hasn't caught up to what a big deal El Fasher is."
best_quote_zh: "世界还没有意识到埃尔法舍尔有多重要。"

title: PG and Jessica
title_zh: PG和Jessica
summary_en: The article reveals the often overlooked secret behind Y Combinator's success: the unique combination of Paul Graham and Jessica Livingston's leadership. Unlike conventional wisdom that attributes YC's growth to replicable strategies or network effects, the author argues that the real magic was their personal approach. They took risks on unknown talents, established strong community norms, and prioritized long-term ecosystem building over short-term gains. The piece highlights how their unwavering conviction, hands-on mentorship, and willingness to challenge existing power structures created an environment where founders could thrive. The author reflects on how this combination of qualities has been remarkably difficult to replicate, despite seeming straightforward. This analysis serves as both a tribute to their impact and a challenge to others to understand the deeper, more human elements of building transformative communities.
summary_zh: 文章揭示了Y Combinator成功背后常被忽视的关键：Paul Graham和Jessica Livingston的独特领导力。与常见的将YC成长归因于可复制策略或网络效应的观点不同，作者认为真正的魔力在于他们的个人风格。他们敢于押注未知人才，建立严格的社区规范，并优先考虑长期生态建设而非短期利益。文章强调他们坚定信念、亲力亲为的指导和挑战现有权力结构的勇气，为创始人创造了茁壮成长的环境。作者反思，尽管这些品质看似简单，但15年来鲜有复制者。这既是对他们的致敬，也是对他人理解构建变革性社区中更深层次、更人性化因素的挑战。
best_quote_en: The entire secret to YC getting going was PG and Jessica—there was no other magic trick.
best_quote_zh: YC起步的全部秘诀就是PG和Jessica——没有其他魔法配方。

title: Essentials: Erasing Fears & Traumas Using Modern Neuroscience
title_zh: Essentials: 使用现代神经科学消除恐惧与创伤
summary_en: This episode of Huberman Lab Essentials dives deep into the neuroscience behind fear and trauma, offering actionable strategies for processing and eliminating traumatic responses. The key insight is that effective fear treatment requires both extinguishing old fearful responses and replacing them with positive associations, not just cognitive reframing. The discussion explores how the threat reflex activates specific neural circuits involving the amygdala, prefrontal cortex, and dopamine systems, and how detailed recounting of traumatic events can reduce their physiological impact over time. The episode also reviews evidence-based approaches like prolonged exposure therapy and cognitive behavioral therapy, and introduces the concept of using five minutes of deliberate stress through cyclic hyperventilation to rewire fear responses. The critical role of social connection in trauma recovery and supplementation options for managing anxiety are also covered, making this a comprehensive guide for anyone seeking to understand and overcome fear-based challenges.
summary_zh: 本集Huberman Lab Essentials深入探讨了恐惧和创伤背后的神经科学机制，并提供了处理和消除创伤反应的实际策略。核心观点是，有效的恐惧治疗需要同时消除旧的恐惧反应并用积极联想取代，而不仅仅是认知重构。节目探讨了威胁反射如何激活涉及杏仁核、前额叶皮层和多巴胺系统的特定神经回路，以及详细回忆创伤事件如何逐渐减少其生理影响。此外，还介绍了基于证据的疗法如漫长暴露疗法和认知行为疗法，以及通过循环性过度换气进行5分钟的刻意压力以重塑恐惧反应的方法。节目还强调了社交联系在创伤康复中的关键作用以及管理焦虑的补充剂选择，使其成为任何想要理解和克服恐惧挑战的人的全面指南。
best_quote_en: Successful fear treatment requires both extinction of the old fearful response and replacement with a new positive association—not just cognitive reframing.
best_quote_zh: 成功的恐惧治疗需要同时消除旧的恐惧反应并用新的积极联想取代，而不仅仅是认知重构。

title: Emma Barnett says she felt ‘mugged, robbed’ after perimenopause at 38
title_zh: 艾玛·巴纳特称在40岁前经历绝经期后感到被抢劫般失去自我
summary_en: Emma Barnett's candid discussion about her experience with perimenopause at 38 highlights the profound identity crisis many women face during this transitional phase. Her raw description of feeling 'mugged, robbed' of her identity resonates with the broader struggle women encounter as hormonal changes reshape their sense of self. The conversation underscores the urgent need for better public awareness and support systems for perimenopausal women, as current healthcare gaps leave many feeling abandoned. Barnett's experience also touches on the commercialization of menopause information, raising important questions about the ethics of profit-driven health advice. This discussion is a powerful call for normalization and education around perimenopause, challenging societal silence and offering solidarity to those experiencing similar struggles.
summary_zh: 艾玛·巴纳特在BBC新播客中坦言40岁前经历更年期时感到被抢劫般失去自我，这揭示了许多女性在这个转变期面临的深刻身份危机。她直白的描述引发共鸣，凸显女性在荷尔蒙变化中自我认知的挑战。这场对话凸显了对更年期女性支持系统的迫切需求，当前医疗空白让许多人感到被遗弃。她的经历也触及更年期信息商业化的伦理问题，呼吁社会正视和教育公众关于更年期的知识，打破沉默，为经历者提供支持。
best_quote_en: 'I do feel there has been a theft. I do feel there’s no emergency number to call. 'I’d like to report a crime. Yeah, someone stole me.' There is no one to report this to.'
best_quote_zh: 我确实觉得被盗了。确实没有紧急电话可以打。'我想报案。是的，有人偷走了我。'但没有人可以报告。

title: The General Social Survey and the ACX Survey
title_zh: 《一般社会调查与ACX调查》
summary_en: This analysis compares demographic and attitudinal data between the Astral Codex Ten (ACX) community and the general population via the General Social Survey (GSS). The study reveals striking differences: the ACX community is significantly younger, more male-dominated, and more educated. Politically, ACX respondents lean heavily Democratic, while the GSS shows more Independents. The most intriguing finding is that the ACX community expresses less concern about AI existential risks than the general population, though this disparity is explained by differing question framings. The author acknowledges potential data mapping challenges and the subjective nature of 'vibecoding' in this comparative analysis. The study offers valuable insights into the demographics and attitudes of the rationalist community compared to broader societal trends.
summary_zh: 本分析通过一般社会调查(GSS)对比了天文代码十号(ACX)社区与普通民众的人口统计和态度数据。研究发现，ACX社区成员年龄更轻、性别比例更为失衡、受教育程度更高。在政治立场上，ACX受访者明显倾向于民主党，而GSS显示独立派比例更高。最引人注目的是，ACX社区对AI存在风险的担忧程度低于普通民众，但这种差异源于问题设置不同。作者承认数据映射的挑战性和'vibecoding'的主观性。该研究为理解理性主义社区与社会大趋势的差异提供了宝贵见解。
best_quote_en: The ACX community is less concerned about AI risk than general population?
best_quote_zh: ACX社区对AI风险的担忧程度低于普通民众？

title: What’s in my NOW? — Ken Batchelor
title_zh: 我的现在里有什么？ — 肯·巴切勒
summary_en: Ken Batchelor's 'What's in my NOW?' offers a reflective glimpse into the simple yet profound tools and practices that enrich his life. From physical items like You Matter cards and barefoot shoes to digital tools like LibraryThing and AlphaGuess, each recommendation carries personal significance. The piece culminates in a poignant meditation on mindfulness, quoting Philip K. Dick's longing to hear the 'sound of the anklets on the feet of an insect as it walks' as a metaphor for finding peace. Batchelor's writing blends practicality with spirituality, inviting readers to consider how small, intentional choices can cultivate joy and presence in daily life.
summary_zh: 肯·巴切勒的《我的现在里有什么？》展现了他在生活中简单而深刻的工具与实践。从物质层面的“重要卡片”和“赤足鞋”，到数字工具“LibraryThing”和“AlphaGuess”，每个推荐都饱含个人意义。文章最终以菲利普·迪克的“倾听昆虫脚铃的声音”为喻，探讨了正念的力量。巴切勒的文字将实用性与精神性交织，邀请读者思考如何通过小而有意的选择，在日常中培育喜悦与当下感。
best_quote_en: Listening for the sound of the anklets on the feet of an insect as it walks.
best_quote_zh: 倾听昆虫脚铃在行走时的声音。

title: Researchers and Founders
title_zh: 研究者与创始人
summary_en: This insightful piece compares the traits of top researchers and founders, revealing surprising differences and key similarities. The author highlights that both groups share exceptional problem-solving skills, focusing on the 'Hamming question' of identifying and tackling the most important problems in their fields. They exhibit a unique combination of laser focus on immediate tasks with long-term vision, persistent work ethic, and a bias towards action. Both groups demonstrate creativity, value autonomy, and are driven by genuine curiosity. The analysis serves as a valuable guide for aspiring professionals in these fields, emphasizing the importance of independent thinking and honest self-assessment.
summary_zh: 这篇文章对比了顶尖研究者与创业者的特质，揭示了他们之间既有惊人的差异，也有关键的共性。作者指出，两者都擅长解决问题，善于思考并攻克领域内最重要的难题。他们兼具短期专注与长远眼光，工作持之以恒，行动力强。两者都富有创造力，重视自主性，并由真正的好奇心驱动。这份分析为有志于这两个领域的人提供了宝贵指南，强调了独立思考和诚实自省的重要性。
best_quote_en: They have a laser focus on the next step in front of them combined with long-term vision. Most people only have one or the other.
best_quote_zh: 他们既有对眼前步骤的激光般专注，又具备长远眼光。大多数人往往只具备其中之一。

title: Using Existing Drugs in New Ways to Treat & Cure Diseases of Brain & Body | Dr. David Fajgenbaum
title_zh: 通过重新利用现有药物治疗和治愈大脑和身体的疾病 | 大卫·法根鲍姆博士
summary_en: This conversation with Dr. David Fajgenbaum reveals the hidden potential of drug repurposing, a practice where existing medications find new applications beyond their original approval. His personal journey with Castleman's disease illustrates the life-saving possibilities when medical professionals and patients explore unconventional treatments. The discussion highlights the systemic challenges in pharmaceutical development, including patent incentives that discourage exploration of new uses for approved drugs. Dr. Fajgenbaum's work with the Every Cure database demonstrates how AI and integrated medical databases can accelerate discovery of these repurposing opportunities. The interview also explores the psychological and systemic factors that prevent broader adoption of this approach, offering both hope and practical tools for patients facing seemingly untreatable conditions.
summary_zh: 与大卫·法根鲍姆博士的对话揭示了药物再利用的潜力，这种方法让已获批药物找到新用途。他个人与卡斯尔曼病的抗争展示了非传统治疗方法的生死意义。讨论揭露了药品研发的系统性挑战，包括阻碍探索已有药物新用途的专利激励机制。法根鲍姆博士的Every Cure数据库工作展示了AI和整合医疗数据库如何加速发现这些再利用机会。采访还探讨了心理和系统因素如何阻碍这种方法的广泛应用，为面对看似无法治愈疾病的患者提供了希望和实用工具。
best_quote_en: The most exciting part about drug repurposing is that we're not waiting for new drugs to be developed, we're finding new uses for drugs that already exist.
best_quote_zh: 药物再利用最令人兴奋的地方在于我们不需要等待新药研发，而是找到已有药物的新用途。

title: The problem of graceful deference
title_zh: 优雅的谦让问题
summary_en: The article explores the psychological and social dynamics of moral deference, particularly in contentious topics like reprogenetics and AI risk. The author examines how people often adopt positions based on social consensus rather than personal conviction, creating a false sense of consensus. This phenomenon, while sometimes justified, can lead to group epistemological failures and hinder critical thinking. The piece advocates for more transparent deference—acknowledging when we're following others' lead—which could improve collective decision-making. It also touches on the broader challenge of deferring to experts in a complex world where we can't be experts on everything. The author's personal reflections on AI safety efforts highlight how even well-intentioned groups can fall into patterns of deferred thinking, emphasizing the need for more open communication about our reasoning processes.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了道德谦让的心理和社会动态，特别是在像繁殖遗传学和AI风险等有争议话题中。作者分析了人们如何基于社会共识而非个人信念采纳立场，从而制造出虚假的共识。这种现象虽有时有道理，但可能导致群体认知失败并抑制批判性思维。文章倡导更透明的谦让——承认我们在何时追随他人意见，这可能改善集体决策。它还触及在复杂世界中我们无法成为所有问题专家时，如何优雅谦让的更广泛挑战。作者关于AI安全努力的个人反思展示了即使善意的群体也可能陷入谦让思维的模式，强调我们需要更开放地沟通我们的推理过程。
best_quote_en: I wish that when someone asked me in, say, 2016, 'Why are you working on decision theory?', I would have not said 'Well I think that a better understanding of decision theory would tell us what sort of agents are possible and then we can understand reflective stability and this will explain the design space of agents which will allow us to figure out what levers we have to set the values of the AI and...'. Instead I wish I had said 'Mainly because Yudkowsky has been working on that and it seems interesting and I know math.'
best_quote_zh: 我希望当有人在2016年问我'为什么你要研究决策理论？'时，我不会说'我认为更好地理解决策理论会告诉我们什么样的智能体是可能的，然后我们可以理解反射稳定性，这将解释智能体的设计空间，从而让我们能够弄清楚设置AI价值的杠杆...'。相反，我希望我当时可以说'主要因为尤德科夫斯基在研究这个，它看起来很有趣，我懂数学。'

title: ‘The chilling effect’: how fear of ‘nudify’ apps and AI deepfakes is keeping Indian women off the internet
title_zh: 冰冷效应：AI深度伪造与'脱衣'应用如何让印度女性远离互联网
summary_en: This report highlights a disturbing trend where AI tools are increasingly used to create non-consensual deepfakes of women in India, leading to severe psychological and social consequences. The 'chilling effect' described shows how fear of digital manipulation is driving women to self-censor and withdraw from online spaces. High-profile cases like those involving Asha Bhosle and Rana Ayyub demonstrate the pervasive nature of this issue, while the legal and platform response remains inadequate. The report reveals a troubling intersection of technology and gender-based violence, where AI democratizes harassment and makes it more difficult to combat. This analysis raises critical questions about digital safety, platform accountability, and the need for stronger legal protections in the face of rapidly evolving AI capabilities.
summary_zh: 本报告揭示了印度女性因AI深度伪造和'脱衣'应用而陷入的困境。这些技术被用于非法创作女性照片，导致心理创伤和社会污名化。高调案例表明，从法律到平台的应对措施仍显滞后。这不仅是技术问题，更暴露了性别暴力的新形式。面对AI技术的快速发展，我们需要重新思考数字安全的边界与责任。
best_quote_en: 'The chilling effect is true,' says Rohini Lakshané. 'The fact that they can be so easily misused makes me extra cautious.'
best_quote_zh: 罗希尼·拉克什内说:'冰冷效应确实存在。这些图片被滥用的可能性让人不得不加倍小心。'

title: Babies born to black mothers 81% more likely to die in neonatal care, NHS study shows
title_zh: NHS研究显示，黑人母亲所生婴儿在新生儿护理中死亡风险增加81%
summary_en: This groundbreaking NHS study reveals alarming disparities in neonatal mortality rates based on ethnicity and socioeconomic status. The research, analyzing over 700,000 births, found that babies born to black mothers face an 81% higher risk of death before discharge compared to white mothers, with Asian mothers also experiencing elevated risks. Socioeconomic factors compound these disparities, with babies from the most deprived areas facing a 63% higher mortality risk. The study underscores the need for systemic changes in healthcare delivery and broader social conditions affecting maternal and infant health. Experts call for urgent action to address these inequalities, emphasizing the need for culturally sensitive care and investment in healthcare infrastructure. This research adds to growing evidence of racial disparities in healthcare outcomes, highlighting systemic biases that persist despite societal progress.
summary_zh: 这项 NHS 研究揭示了新生儿死亡率在种族和社会经济地位上的惊人差异。研究分析了超过70万例出生数据，发现黑人母亲所生婴儿在出院前死亡的风险比白人母亲高出81%，亚洲母亲所生婴儿的风险也有所增加。社会经济因素加剧了这些差异，来自最贫困地区的婴儿死亡风险增加了63%。该研究强调了需要在医疗服务和更广泛的社会条件方面进行系统性变革。专家呼吁采取紧急行动来解决这些不平等，强调需要文化敏感度的护理和医疗基础设施的投资。这一研究为种族在医疗结果中的差异提供了更多证据，凸显了尽管社会进步，但仍然存在的系统性偏见。
best_quote_en: 'Socioeconomic and ethnic inequalities independently shape survival in neonatal units, and maternal and birth factors explain only over half of the socioeconomic and ethnic inequalities.' - Samira Saberian, lead author
best_quote_zh: “社会经济和种族不平等独立地影响新生儿重症监护病房的存活率，而母亲和分娩因素仅能解释超过一半的社会经济和种族不平等。” —— 主要作者萨米拉·萨贝里安

title: The Fatal Pinch
title_zh: 致命挤压
summary_en: The 'fatal pinch' describes a critical phase in startups where they have sufficient cash but are burning through it without meaningful revenue growth. Founders often delude themselves about securing additional funding, but investors have higher expectations for existing companies. The situation becomes self-reinforcing as founders delay profitability, making future funding even harder to obtain. The article advises treating each funding round as the last, and if already in the pinch, to either shut down, cut expenses (including firing underperforming staff), or increase revenues through alternative means. The key insight is that startups should pivot to more immediately profitable activities, even if it means temporary consulting work, to ensure survival. The piece offers practical, albeit harsh, advice for startups facing financial distress, emphasizing the importance of ruthless decision-making to avoid a slow, inevitable decline.
summary_zh: 致命挤压指初创公司在濒临破产前的关键阶段，尽管银行账户有余款，但每月亏损严重且收入增长乏力。创始人往往高估融资概率，但投资者对已融资公司期望更高。这种情况会自我强化，推迟盈利反而降低融资机会。文章建议将每轮融资视为最后一笔，若已陷入困境，需选择关闭公司、削减开支或增加收入。关键在于灵活转型，即使通过临时咨询业务也要确保生存。这篇文章提供了务实但严厉的建议，强调在财务困境中必须做出无情决策，避免缓慢衰败的命运。
best_quote_en: The company is now starting to read as a failure. The first time it raised money, it was neither a success nor a failure; it was too early to ask. Now it's possible to ask that question, and the default answer is failure, because at this point that is the default outcome.
best_quote_zh: 公司现在开始被视为失败。第一次融资时，它既不是成功也不是失败；那时还为时过早。现在可以问这个问题了，而默认答案是失败，因为在这一点上，失败是默认结果。

title: The Mess at the BBC Will Never End
title_zh: BBC的混乱将永无止境
summary_en: The article delves into the ongoing crisis at the BBC, highlighting internal and external pressures threatening its credibility. A leaked memo from former adviser Michael Prescott exposed perceived biases in BBC's coverage of Trump, racial diversity, gender issues, and the Gaza war. The controversy escalated with high-profile resignations and political attacks, revealing deep-seated tensions between the broadcaster and its critics. The piece explores the BBC's struggle to maintain impartiality amid budget cuts, political interference, and public distrust. It raises questions about whether the current crisis stems from genuine concerns or a concerted effort to undermine the institution. The BBC's future hangs in the balance as it grapples with systemic challenges and existential threats to its funding model.
summary_zh: 文章深入分析了BBC持续的危机，揭示了内部和外部压力对其信誉构成的威胁。前顾问迈克尔·普雷斯科特泄露的备忘录揭露了BBC在报道特朗普、种族多样性、性别问题和加沙战争等问题上的偏见。争议随着高层辞职和政治攻击升级，揭示了广播公司与批评者之间的深层紧张关系。文章探讨了BBC在预算削减、政治干预和公众不信任的压力下，如何维持公正性。它提出了一个问题：当前的危机是出于真正的关切，还是试图破坏这一机构的蓄意努力。随着BBC应对系统性挑战和对其资金模式的生存威胁，其未来命运悬而未决。
best_quote_en: It feels as if it’s a criticism which is designed to undermine the BBC as a whole.
best_quote_zh: 这看起来更像是旨在削弱BBC整体的批评。

title: What’s in my NOW? — Rob Ray
title_zh: What’s in my NOW? — Rob Ray
summary_en: Rob Ray's 'What’s in my NOW?' offers a fascinating blend of practical tools and profound philosophical reflections. On the practical side, he shares his experiences with 3D printing, CAD tools, and gardening, highlighting accessible and reliable technologies. The mention of Bambu Labs A1 Mini 3D printers and Plasticity CAD tool provides valuable insights for educators and hobbyists alike. However, the most compelling part of the piece is the exploration of Drexciya, an Afrofuturist mythology that transforms historical trauma into a narrative of resilience and imagination. This dual focus on tangible tools and intangible inspiration makes the content particularly engaging. It challenges readers to think about how they can integrate both practical and visionary elements into their own lives.
summary_zh: 罗布·雷的《What’s in my NOW?》结合了实用工具和深刻的哲学思考。在实用层面，他分享了关于3D打印、CAD工具和园艺的经验，突出了易于获取和可靠的技术。提到的Bambu Labs A1 Mini 3D打印机和Plasticity CAD工具为教育工作者和爱好者提供了宝贵的见解。然而，文章最引人入胜的部分是探索Drexciya这一非洲未来主义神话，它将历史创伤转化为抗争和想象力的叙事。这种实用与启发并重的双重视角使内容特别引人深思，挑战读者如何在生活中融合实践与远见。
best_quote_en: Drexciya is a mythic, Afrofuturist world imagined by Detroit’s electronic musicians, James Stinson and Gerald Donald, in the early 1990s. They envisioned an underwater kingdom born from the Middle Passage, where the unborn children of enslaved women threw or lost to the sea adapted to breathe underwater and created their own autonomous world.
best_quote_zh: Drexciya是由底特律电子音乐人詹姆斯·斯蒂文森和杰拉尔德·唐纳德在1990年代初构想的一个神话般的非洲未来主义世界。他们想象了一个诞生于中途岛的水下王国，那里未出生的奴隶女性被扔进或失踪于大海的孩子们适应了水下呼吸，并创造了自己的自治世界。

title: Project Covalence
title_zh: Project Covalence
summary_en: Project Covalence emerges as a critical initiative to accelerate COVID-19 clinical trials, addressing a major bottleneck in the pandemic response. By collaborating with TrialSpark and Dr. Mark Fishman, the project offers comprehensive support for trials, including remote data collection, telemedicine, and logistical coordination. What makes this initiative particularly compelling is its focus on community and home-based trials, reducing the burden on overwhelmed healthcare systems. The creation of master protocols for platform studies further demonstrates its innovative approach to trial design. This project exemplifies how technology and strategic partnerships can dramatically improve the efficiency of medical research during global crises.
summary_zh: Project Covalence是一个加速COVID-19临床试验的关键项目，解决疫情应对中的重要瓶颈。通过与TrialSpark和Fishman博士合作，该项目为试验提供全面支持，包括远程数据收集、远程医疗和后勤协调。项目特别关注社区和家庭基地试验，减轻医疗系统的负担。创建平台研究的主协议进一步展示了其创新的试验设计方法。该项目展示了技术和战略合作如何在全球危机中显著提高医学研究效率。
best_quote_en: Science remains the only way out of the COVID-19 crisis. Dramatically improving clinical trials, which are usually time-consuming and cost tens to hundreds of millions of dollars, is one of the highest-leverage ways to get out of it faster.
best_quote_zh: 科学仍然是走出COVID-19危机的唯一途径。大幅提高临床试验效率，通常耗时且成本高昂，是加速走出危机的最高杠杆之一。

title: Born in the forest: the women giving birth alone in the Kashmiri mountains
title_zh: 在喀什米尔山区独自生产的女性：森林中的诞生
summary_en: This harrowing account sheds light on the perilous childbirth conditions faced by nomadic Gujjar and Bakarwal women in Kashmir's high mountain passes. The article reveals how these women, often pregnant during their seasonal migrations, must give birth in remote, unsanitary conditions without access to proper medical care. The piece highlights systemic healthcare failures, cultural practices like early marriage, and the critical role of traditional midwives. It also draws parallels with similar challenges faced by pastoralist women globally, offering a stark reminder of the maternal health disparities that persist in marginalized communities. The human stories make this an urgent call for mobile healthcare solutions and policy reforms.
summary_zh: 这个触目惊心的报道揭露了喀什米尔游牧民族古吉尔和巴卡瓦尔女性在高山迁徙途中面临的危险分娩条件。文章揭示了这些女性在偏远、卫生条件恶劣的地方分娩时，无法获得适当医疗照护的困境。它突出了体制性的医疗失败、早婚等文化习俗，以及传统助产士的关键作用。文章还与全球其他游牧女性面临的类似挑战进行了比较，为我们敲响了边缘群体中持续存在的产妇健康差距的警钟。这些人性化的故事呼吁着移动医疗解决方案和政策改革的迫切性。
best_quote_en: We have only the knowledge passed down to us – no medicines, no doctor. If I fall sick, who will help these women?
best_quote_zh: 我们只有代代相传的知识——没有药物，没有医生。如果我生病或年老了，谁来帮助这些女性？

title: Mean People Fail
title_zh: Why Mean People Fail
summary_en: This insightful essay explores the inverse correlation between meanness and success, particularly in startup ecosystems. The author observes that successful individuals in tech and academia tend to be kind rather than mean, attributing this to several factors. Mean people often engage in fights that limit their intellectual growth and ability to attract top talent. Successful startups win by innovating rather than attacking, and their founders are often driven by a desire to improve the world rather than purely financial motives. The piece argues that the nature of success is shifting from zero-sum games to idea-driven ventures, where kindness and collaboration are increasingly valuable. This historical shift suggests that meanness, which was once advantageous, is now a liability in many professional fields.
summary_zh: 这篇文章深入探讨了人性中的恶意与成功之间的逆相关性，特别是在创业生态系统中。作者观察到，科技和学术界的成功人士往往更为善良而非恶意，并归因于多个因素。恶意之人常常陷入争斗，限制了他们的智力发展和吸引顶尖人才的能力。成功的创业公司通过创新而非攻击取得胜利，其创始人往往是出于改善世界的愿望而非纯粹的财务动机。文章认为，成功的性质正从零和博弈转向以创意驱动的事业，善良与合作在许多职业领域中越来越有价值。这一历史性的转变表明，恶意，曾经是一种优势，现在却成了一个劣势。
best_quote_en: Being mean makes you stupid. That's why I hate fights. You never do your best work in a fight, because fights are not sufficiently general.
best_quote_zh: 恶意会让你变得愚蠢。这就是我讨厌争斗的原因。在争斗中，你永远无法做到最好，因为争斗并不够全面。

title: The Epstein Scandal Is Now a Chronic Disease of the Trump Presidency
title_zh: 艾普斯坦丑闻已成为特朗普总统任期的慢性病
summary_en: The Epstein scandal has evolved into a persistent political liability for Donald Trump, resurfacing with new vigor during his second term. Initially dismissed as a non-issue, the controversy has gained traction due to the administration's refusal to release Justice Department files, which has sparked conspiracy theories and political maneuvering. Recent document releases reveal Trump's name appears thousands of times, with emails suggesting ongoing ties and potential connections to Russian officials. The White House's damage control efforts have backfired, raising more questions than answers. This scandal, like a chronic disease, continues to afflict Trump's presidency, overshadowing his administration's achievements and fueling political turmoil within his own party.
summary_zh: 艾普斯坦丑闻已成为特朗普总统任期的慢性病，持续发酵并影响其政治前景。最初未引起重视，但因政府拒绝公开司法部档案，激发阴谋论和政治操弄。近期公布的文件显示特朗普名字出现数千次，邮件暗示两人关系未断，并可能与俄罗斯官员有联系。白宫的损害控制措施适得其反，引发更多质疑。这场丑闻如慢性病般困扰特朗普，掩盖其成就，并加剧其党内矛盾。
best_quote_en: The scandal never seemed to stick politically to Trump—until recently, when Trump’s second-term Administration has given it a whole new life.
best_quote_zh: 这场丑闻从未对特朗普造成政治影响——直到最近，他的第二任期政府才让它重获新生。

title: US Airport Mayhem/NewLife Estimator/Remote Locker Pickups
title_zh: 美国机场混乱/新生活成本估算/亚马逊货柜取货
summary_en: This newsletter provides practical tips for travelers and expats navigating current challenges. The first piece warns about air travel disruptions due to the US government shutdown, advising alternative transportation and insurance. The second feature offers a useful tool for estimating living costs when relocating abroad, highlighting significant savings potential. A packing hack suggests combining travel with downsizing to reduce luggage. Lastly, it introduces Amazon's locker service as a convenient solution for nomads receiving packages in the US. The content is highly actionable, offering immediate solutions to common travel and relocation problems.
summary_zh: 这篇周报为旅行者和移民提供实用建议。首先警示美国政府停摆导致的航空混乱，建议考虑替代交通方式和投保。其次介绍一个估算海外生活成本的工具，凸显显著节省空间。提供轻装旅行的技巧，建议将旅行与减负结合。最后推荐亚马逊货柜服务，方便游牧者在美国收取包裹。内容极具实用价值，解决常见出行和移民难题。
best_quote_en: If you’re going to get rid of something in your closet, like a pair of shoes, a shirt, or pants, then wear the item(s) on your next flight or pack them. Then ditch them after you’ve worn them a few times in the destination, lightening your load for the remainder or the return.
best_quote_zh: 如果你打算淘汰衣柜里的东西，比如一双鞋子、一件衬衫或一条裤子，不如在下次飞行时穿上或打包。抵达目的地后穿几次就丢弃，减轻返程的负担。

title: Idea Generation
title_zh: 创意产生
summary_en: This article provides a deep dive into the crucial skill of idea generation for startup founders, emphasizing that having a continuous flow of ideas is essential for success. It highlights the importance of surrounding oneself with innovative, future-oriented individuals who embrace unconventional thinking. The author suggests focusing on major technological and societal shifts, identifying opportunities at the leading edge of change, and evaluating ideas based on their potential for massive success. The piece also stresses the importance of founder-company fit and the ability to recognize why an idea might initially seem bad but could ultimately be brilliant. The insights are equally applicable to AI development, showing the timeless nature of these principles.
summary_zh: 这篇文章深入探讨了创业者必须具备的创意产生能力，强调持续不断的创意流是成功的关键。文中指出，要与富有创新精神、面向未来的人物交往，接受非传统思维。作者建议关注重大技术和社会变革，识别变革前沿的机会，并以潜在成功的可能性评估创意。文章还强调了创始人与公司的契合度，以及辨别初看不佳但可能卓越的创意的能力。这些见解同样适用于AI开发，显示了这些原则的永恒价值。
best_quote_en: The best ideas are fragile; most people don’t even start talking about them at all because they sound silly.
best_quote_zh: 最好的想法很脆弱；大多数人甚至不愿谈论它们，因为它们听起来很愚蠢。

title: ’Tis the season for dubious TV adverts | Letters
title_zh: 圣诞季节充满可疑的电视广告 | 读者来信
summary_en: This collection of letters critiques the John Lewis Christmas advertisement, highlighting its perceived insincerity and negative societal impacts. Readers argue that the ad manipulates consumers into thinking their purchases are meaningful while ignoring the company's lack of employee bonuses. Others point out historical inaccuracies and gender stereotyping in the ad's portrayal of family dynamics. The discussion reveals deeper concerns about consumerism, advertising ethics, and societal expectations around gender roles during the holiday season. The letters collectively serve as a critical examination of corporate messaging and its cultural implications.
summary_zh: 读者来信集中批评了John Lewis的圣诞广告，指出其虚伪和对社会的负面影响。读者认为，广告试图让消费者误以为购物有意义，却忽略了公司多年未发放员工奖金的事实。还有人指出广告中对历史的错误描绘和对性别角色的刻板印象。这些来信共同构成了对企业宣传和文化影响的批判性分析。
best_quote_en: This ad is a shameless attempt to make consumers think they are doing something worthwhile in buying overpriced gifts in a failing store that used to share its profits with staff but hasn't paid them any bonus in the past few years.
best_quote_zh: 这则广告是赤裸裸地试图让消费者认为，在一家曾经与员工分享利润但近年来未发放任何奖金的失败商店里购买高价礼物是一件有意义的事情。

title: Before the Startup
title_zh: 启动之前
summary_en: Paul Graham's 'Before the Startup' offers counterintuitive wisdom about launching startups, emphasizing that conventional instincts often lead to mistakes. He compares startup challenges to learning to ski, where natural impulses must be overcome. Key insights include: trusting gut feelings about people, focusing on user needs over startup expertise, recognizing that startups are all-consuming, and that true startup ideas emerge from genuine curiosity rather than forced brainstorming. Graham advises against starting a startup in college, suggesting that broad exploration in early 20s is more valuable. The essay ultimately champions deep learning and working on interesting problems as the best preparation for entrepreneurial success.
summary_zh: 保罗·格雷厄姆在《启动之前》中揭示了创业的反直觉智慧，指出常规的直觉往往导致错误。他将创业挑战比作学习滑雪，需要克服自然冲动。核心观点包括：信任对人的直觉、专注用户需求而非创业专业知识、认识到创业将彻底占据生活、真正的创业想法源于真诚的好奇心而非强行头脑风暴。他建议大学生不要创业，认为二十岁出头的人应广泛探索。文章最终倡导深入学习和投身有趣的问题作为创业成功的最佳准备。
best_quote_en: Starting a startup is like a brutally fast depth-first search. Most people should still be searching breadth-first at 20.
best_quote_zh: 创业就像一个残酷的深度优先搜索。大多数人在20岁的时候仍然应该进行广度优先搜索。

title: "Middlemarch" is inane and also one of my favorite books
title_zh: 《米德尔马契》无聊却是我最喜欢的书之一
summary_en: The analysis explores the complex relationship between idealism and reality through the character Dorothea in Middlemarch. The author appreciates how the novel captures the struggle of principled individuals when faced with emotional and practical challenges. Key insights include the nuanced portrayal of Dorothea's evolving principles regarding beauty and religion, the tension between high aspirations and real-world limitations, and the universal experience of disillusionment after marriage. The text also reflects on personal growth through failure and the natural process of forming opinions under emotional duress. The analysis highlights the novel's enduring relevance in depicting human nature and societal expectations.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了《米德尔马契》中理想与现实冲突的主题。作者欣赏小说如何描绘原则性格者面对情感和实际挑战的挣扎。核心见解包括多罗西娅在美与宗教原则上的演变，理想与现实限制的张力，以及婚后幻灭的普遍体验。文字还反思了通过失败实现的个人成长，以及在情感压力下自然形成观点的过程。分析强调小说描绘人性和社会期望的持久意义。
best_quote_en: 'The weight of unintelligible Rome might lie easily on bright nymphs to whom it formed a background for the brilliant picnic of Anglo-foreign society; but Dorothea had no such defence against deep impressions.'
best_quote_zh: ‘对那些将其视为英法社会灿烂野餐背景的明媚仙女而言，难以理解的罗马重量或许轻而易举；但多罗西娅却没有这样的防护来抵挡深刻的印象。’”

title: The Liberal Scholars Who Influenced Trump’s Attack on Birthright Citizenship
title_zh: 影响特朗普限制出生公民权的自由派学者
summary_en: This article explores the unintended consequences of academic research, tracing how a 1985 book by liberal Yale professors Peter H. Schuck and Rogers M. Smith became the foundation for modern challenges to birthright citizenship. Their work, initially dismissed by peers, was later adopted by anti-immigration activists and eventually influenced Trump's executive order. The piece examines the historical context of the 14th Amendment, the legal debates surrounding 'subject to the jurisdiction,' and how scholarly ideas can be weaponized for political purposes. It serves as a cautionary tale about the long-term impact of academic theories and the responsibility scholars have in shaping public policy.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了学术研究的意外后果，追溯了1985年两位耶鲁大学自由派学者彼得·舒克和罗杰斯·史密斯的著作如何成为现代挑战出生公民权的基础。他们的作品最初被学术界忽视，后来被反移民活动家采纳，并最终影响了特朗普的行政命令。文章分析了第十四修正案的历史背景，围绕“受其管辖”的法律争议，以及学术观点如何被政治化。它警示我们学术理论可能对公共政策产生的长期影响和学者的责任。
best_quote_en: When we wrote the book, we thought that it was such a novel argument that people would disregard it. They never imagined that being taken seriously would be the bigger problem.
best_quote_zh: 我们写这本书时，以为这是一个如此新颖的论点，人们会忽视它。他们从未想象被认真对待反而会成为更大的问题。

title: Only What’s Necessary / The White Donkey
title_zh: 只有必要的/白驴
summary_en: This analysis presents two distinct books that offer profound insights through contrasting lenses. 'Only What’s Necessary' is a meticulously curated celebration of Charles Schulz's Peanuts, showcasing the evolution of the iconic comic strip through rare artifacts and thoughtful curation. It reveals Schulz's artistic philosophy of minimalism and emotional resonance, demonstrating how simplicity can convey complex human experiences. The book's production values and contextual analysis make it a treasure trove for both casual fans and scholars. In contrast, 'The White Donkey' offers a raw, unflinching look at military service through the lens of Terminal Lance creator Maximillian Uriarte. This graphic novel explores themes of privilege, purpose, and the psychological toll of war, using stark visual storytelling to convey the disillusionment of a Marine's journey. Both works demonstrate the power of visual storytelling in different contexts, one celebrating the enduring appeal of childhood nostalgia, the other exposing the harsh realities of modern warfare.
summary_zh: 这份分析呈现了两本截然不同的书籍，通过不同视角提供深刻见解。《只有必要的》是对查尔斯·舒尔茨《花生漫画》的精心策展，通过罕见文物和深思熟虑的策展展示了这部经典连环漫画的演变。它揭示了舒尔茨
best_quote_en: Necessary can also mean everything: every line needed to show the characters’ feelings and reactions, every word needed to express the artist’s vision, every single thing needed to show why we still need Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Linus, and Lucy now, and for many years to come.
best_quote_zh: 必要也可以意味着一切：每一条线条都需要表达角色的感受和反应，每一个词语都需要表达艺术家的愿景，每一件事物都需要展示为什么我们仍然需要查理·布朗、史努比、林纳斯和露西现在，以及未来许多年。

title: Diagonalization: A (slightly) more rigorous model of paranoia
title_zh: 对角化：一种（稍微）更严谨的偏执模型
summary_en: This article delves into the concept of 'diagonalization' as a model for understanding paranoia in adversarial environments. The author explores three core strategies for dealing with more competent adversaries: self-blinding, eliminating deception sources, and acting unpredictably. The piece critically examines the limitations of these strategies in real-world scenarios and discusses how the model might be refined. The author's personal engagement with the topic is evident, particularly in their search for a more accessible term than 'diagonalization' to describe this complex concept. The article blends theoretical rigor with practical insights, making it valuable for those interested in decision-making under adversity.
summary_zh: 文章深入探讨了“对角化”这一概念，作为理解敌对环境中偏执行为的模型。作者提出了三种核心策略：自我盲化、消除欺骗来源和行为不确定化。文章批判性地分析了这些策略在现实中的局限性，并讨论了如何完善这一模型。作者对该主题的个人参与尤为明显，特别是他们寻找一个比“对角化”更易于理解的术语。这篇文章将理论严谨性与实用见解相结合，对那些在敌对环境中做决策的人具有价值。
best_quote_en: The best you can do is to operate on a minimax strategy where you take actions assuming your opponent is playing strictly optimally against you.
best_quote_zh: 你能做的最好的就是采用最小化最大损失策略，假设你的对手正在以最佳方式对抗你而采取行动。

title: The Mystery of the Political Assassin
title_zh: 政治刺客的谜团
summary_en: This essay explores the complex nature of political assassinations, arguing that their outcomes often diverge wildly from their perpetrators' intentions. Through historical examples like Gavrilo Princip and Yitzhak Rabin's assassins, the author examines how assassinations become symbols that outlive their immediate causes. The piece highlights the shift from organized political violence to individual acts driven by personal grievances and online radicalization. It also critiques the public's tendency to project meaning onto these acts, as seen in the case of Luigi Mangione's assassination of a healthcare CEO. The analysis suggests that while assassinations may gain symbolic significance, meaningful change requires organized social movements rather than isolated violent acts.
summary_zh: 这篇文章探讨了政治刺杀的复杂本质，指出其结果往往与刺客的初衷相去甚远。通过格里尔·普林西普和拉宾刺客等历史案例，作者分析了刺杀如何演变为超越其直接动机的象征。文中强调了政治暴力从组织化行动转向个人行为的转变，这些行为常由个人怨恨和网络激进化驱动。同时，文章批评了公众将意义投射到这些行为上的倾向，如卢伊吉·曼吉奥内刺杀医疗CEO的案例。分析表明，尽管刺杀可能获得象征意义，但真正的变革需要有组织的社会运动，而非孤立的暴力行为。
best_quote_en: The problem with most revolutionary acts is that the message is lost on normies. What do you do? You wack the CEO at the annual parasitic bean-counter convention. It's targeted, precise, and doesn't risk innocents.
best_quote_zh: 大多数革命行为的问题在于，普通人无法理解其信息。你该怎么做？在每年那个寄生虫式的财务分析师大会上干掉CEO。这是精准、有效的，而且不会伤及无辜。

title: Everything I wish I’d known before I decided to freeze my eggs at 36
title_zh: 36岁时冻卵，我希望自己提前知道的一切
summary_en: This deeply personal account offers a candid look at the egg freezing process, addressing both the practical and emotional aspects. The author highlights the importance of understanding egg freezing as part of the IVF journey, not a guaranteed path to parenthood. Key insights include the necessity of thorough clinic research, the impact of age on success rates, and the often overlooked logistical challenges like scheduling and physical side effects. The article also debunks common misconceptions, such as the belief that supplements significantly improve outcomes, and warns against clinics that oversell their services. Most importantly, it emphasizes the emotional toll and the need for support networks. The piece serves as both a practical guide and a thoughtful reflection on modern fertility choices.
summary_zh: 这篇文章深入剖析了冻卵过程的实际和情感两方面，作者强调需要将冻卵视为试管婴儿的第一步，而非保证怀孕的方法。关键点包括选择诊所的重要性、年龄对成功率的影响，以及常被忽视的时间安排和身体反应等实践问题。文章还纠正了补充剂显著提高成功率的误解，并警惕过度营销的诊所。尤其值得注意的，是对情感影响的探讨和支持网络的建议。这既是一份实用指南，也是对当代生育选择的深刻思考。
best_quote_en: 'It gives you another option to try to become a parent using your own genetic material, but in no way does it guarantee that will happen.'
best_quote_zh: 它为你提供了用自身遗传物质尝试成为父母的另一种选择，但绝不保证能实现。

title: Untie me! Why big bows are everywhere – feminine, ironic and strangely subversive
title_zh: 解开我！为什么大蝴蝶结无处不在——女性化、讽刺且奇特地叛逆
summary_en: This article explores the cultural phenomenon of oversized bows in fashion, examining their evolution from Victorian times to contemporary trends. The analysis reveals how bows have become a multifaceted symbol, representing both traditional femininity and modern subversion. The piece highlights the irony of bows as both demure and rebellious, worn by celebrities and athletes alike, while also discussing their psychological and social implications. The author argues that bows have transcended their decorative function to become a statement of identity and resistance, challenging gender norms and offering a playful yet powerful form of self-expression.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了大蝴蝶结在时尚中的文化现象，从维多利亚时代到当代趋势的演变。分析揭示了蝴蝶结如何成为多面象征，既代表传统女性气质又体现现代反叛。文章提到，蝴蝶结既可温婉又可反叛，被名人和运动员所穿戴，同时探讨了其心理和社会影响。作者认为，蝴蝶结超越了装饰功能，成为身份和抵抗的象征，挑战性别规范，以一种有趣而有力的方式表达自我。
best_quote_en: The way bows are used today is often in contrast to something darker, a joyful element in a dark time.
best_quote_zh: 今天的蝴蝶结使用方式往往与黑暗事物形成对比，在黑暗时代成为欢乐的元素。

title: How to Raise Money
title_zh: 如何筹集资金
summary_en: This comprehensive guide to startup fundraising offers invaluable insights into the complex process of securing investment. It emphasizes the importance of understanding investor psychology, maintaining focus during the fundraising process, and strategically navigating the various phases of capital raising. The author stresses that fundraising is not an end in itself but a means to accelerate growth, and that founders should avoid becoming distracted by it. Key takeaways include the need to treat investors as saying 'no' until they unequivocally say 'yes,' the value of breadth-first search weighted by expected value, and the importance of closing committed money quickly. The guide also warns against the dangers of wishful thinking and the misleading tactics of some investors. Overall, it provides a practical and nuanced roadmap for founders seeking to navigate the challenging landscape of startup funding.
summary_zh: 这篇关于如何筹集资金的详细指南为初创公司提供了宝贵的洞察。它强调理解投资者心理、在筹资过程中保持专注以及战略性地规划资本筹集的不同阶段的重要性。作者指出，筹资不是目的，而是加速增长的手段，创始人应避免被其分散注意力。主要观点包括：在投资者明确表示同意之前，应将其视为拒绝；采用基于期望值的广度优先搜索；以及尽快落实承诺的资金。指南还警告说，盲目乐观和一些投资者的误导策略存在危险。总体而言，它为寻求在充满挑战的初创公司融资环境中开辟道路的创始人提供了一个实用且富有洞察力的路线图。
best_quote_en: Don't raise money unless you want it and it wants you.
best_quote_zh: 除非你想要融资且融资也想要你，否则不要融资。

title: Coral
title_zh: 珊瑚
summary_en: This article explores the fascinating world of coral reefs and marine life through the lens of field guides and personal experiences. It highlights the alien-like diversity of underwater ecosystems, emphasizing how guides like Peterson's and Humann's work help both beginners and experts identify and appreciate marine species. The piece also delves into the hobby of creating natural reef aquariums, showcasing how amateur reefers contribute to our understanding of marine ecology. The inclusion of 'The Shape of Life' series further underscores the importance of taxonomic education in appreciating life's diversity. The author's personal awe and reverence for these ecosystems add a layer of emotional engagement, making the content both informative and inspiring.
summary_zh: 这篇文章通过野外指南和个人经历，探索了珊瑚礁和海洋生物的奇妙世界。它强调了海底生态系统的异域般多样性，并说明了像彼得森和哈曼这样的指南如何帮助初学者和专家识别和欣赏海洋物种。文章还深入探讨了创建自然珊瑚礁水族箱的爱好，展示了业余爱好者如何为我们对海洋生态的理解做出贡献。'生命的形态'系列的加入进一步强调了分类学教育在欣赏生命多样性中的重要性。作者对这些生态系统的个人敬畏之情，为内容增添了情感层面，使其既富有信息量又富有启发性。
best_quote_en: Life is simply far stranger than we can imagine, and nowhere is that more evident than in the compressed diversity of a coral reef.
best_quote_zh: 生活比我们想象的要奇妙得多，而在珊瑚礁这种高度浓缩的多样性中，这一点表现得最为明显。

title: Please Fund More Science
title_zh: 请为科学研究提供更多资金
summary_en: The article highlights three potential pathways to normalize life post-COVID-19: vaccine development, effective treatments, or robust public health measures. The author criticizes the federal government's insufficient funding for R&D and calls on investors and donors to support scientific efforts. Notably, the piece emphasizes the unprecedented speed and focus of biotech companies and research labs in tackling the pandemic. It positions scientific innovation as the key to overcoming the crisis and urges financial support to accelerate progress. The author also suggests this moment will be transformative, requiring sustained investment in pandemic preparedness.
summary_zh: 文章提出了三种可能的路径来使生活在新冠疫情后恢复正常：疫苗研发、有效治疗方法，或严格的公共卫生措施。作者批评联邦政府对科研的资助不足，呼吁投资者和捐赠者支持科学研究。尤其值得注意的，作者强调了生物技术公司和研究机构在应对疫情时前所未有的速度和专注。文中将科学创新视为战胜疫情的关键，呼吁提供资金以加速进展。作者还认为，这一时刻将带来变革，需要持续投资于疫情防范。
best_quote_en: Scientists can get us out of this. What they need are money and connections.
best_quote_zh: 科学家能够帮助我们摆脱困境。他们需要的是资金和人脉。

title: Essentials: Breathing for Mental & Physical Health & Performance | Dr. Jack Feldman
title_zh: 精华：呼吸对心理与身体健康和表现的重要性 | 杰克·费尔德曼博士
summary_en: This episode with Dr. Jack Feldman delves into the fascinating science of breathing, revealing how our breath patterns influence both mental and physical states. Feldman explains the neural circuits behind breathing and how different techniques can reduce anxiety, enhance emotional resilience, and even improve cognitive performance. The discussion goes beyond theory, offering practical tools like box breathing and insights into supplements like magnesium L-threonate. The episode bridges neuroscience with actionable health practices, making it valuable for those seeking to optimize their well-being through scientifically validated methods. Feldman's expertise transforms complex biological processes into understandable concepts, empowering listeners to harness the power of breath in their daily lives.
summary_zh: 费尔德曼博士深入探讨呼吸的科学原理，揭示呼吸模式如何影响心理和身体状态。他解释了呼吸背后的神经回路，以及不同呼吸技巧如何减轻焦虑、增强情绪韧性并提升认知表现。内容超越理论，提供实用工具如方形呼吸法和关于镁盐补充剂的见解。该节目将神经科学与可操作的健康实践相结合，对希望通过科学验证的方法优化自身健康的人群非常有价值。费尔德曼将复杂的生物过程转化为易懂的概念，使听众能在日常生活中运用呼吸的力量。
best_quote_en: Breathing patterns profoundly influence mental states, including their role in reducing anxiety and enhancing emotional resilience.
best_quote_zh: 呼吸模式深刻影响心理状态，包括减轻焦虑和增强情绪韧性方面的作用。

title: ‘You definitely felt disposable’: models – one 27, one 62 – discuss Botox, weight loss, creativity and the threat of AI
title_zh: “你一定觉得自己被轻视”：一位27岁、一位62岁的模特聊瓷肌针、减肥、创造力与AI的威胁
summary_en: This insightful interview with models Dee O and Danielle Mareka reveals the stark realities behind the glamorous facade of the modeling industry. The conversation spans decades, highlighting how the profession has evolved with technology and societal changes. Key insights include the mental health challenges models face, the industry's slow progress on diversity and body representation, and the emerging threats from AI and weight-loss drugs. The discussion also touches on the power dynamics and predatory behavior that persist despite movements like #MeToo. What stands out is the models' resilience and their advice to build identities beyond modeling, emphasizing that while the profession offers unique opportunities, it's not without significant personal costs.
summary_zh: 这篇对话揭示了模特行业背后的残酷现实，从1980年代到当代，模特们面临的挑战和行业变革。两位模特分享了职业的高光与阴暗面，从AI模特到减肥针，从种族代表性到心理健康压力，行业的问题层出不穷。尽管有进步，但性剥削、身材压力等问题依然存在。她们的经历提醒我们，模特职业虽诱人，但需要建立超越职业的自我认同。
best_quote_en: When you join the worker council at Model Alliance, they have you sign something just to let you know that getting dropped by your agent because of your connection to the organisation is a possibility.
best_quote_zh: 当你加入模特联盟工会时，他们会让你签一份文件，提醒你可能因为与组织的关联而被经纪人解约。

title: How M.B.S. Won Back Washington
title_zh: M.B.S. 如何重新赢得华盛顿的支持
summary_en: The article explores the remarkable rehabilitation of Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman (M.B.S.) in Washington, particularly after the controversial Khashoggi murder. Despite initial international condemnation, M.B.S. has successfully rebuilt his reputation through strategic investments in sports and aligning with U.S. energy interests, especially after Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The piece delves into the complex Saudi-American relationship, highlighting how both the Biden and Trump administrations have re-embraced M.B.S., driven by economic interests and geopolitical considerations. The interview with F. Gregory Gause reveals M.B.S.'s efforts to modernize Saudi Arabia while maintaining authoritarian control, his cautious foreign policy approach post-Khashoggi, and the nuanced dynamics with Israel, Iran, and regional allies. The analysis underscores the intersection of personal and national interests in U.S.-Saudi relations, raising questions about the future of nonproliferation policies and the sustainability of this renewed partnership.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼（M.B.S.）在华盛顿的形象重塑之路，尤其在哈沙吉事件后。尽管最初受到国际谴责，M.B.S.通过投资体育和与美国能源利益的战略对齐，在乌克兰危机后成功恢复了声誉。采访中，F. Gregory Gause揭示了M.B.S.推动沙特现代化的同时维持专制统治，在哈沙吉事件后调整外交政策，以及与以色列、伊朗和地区盟友的复杂关系。分析凸显了美国与沙特关系中个人与国家利益的交织，并质疑未来核不扩散政策和这一新伙伴关系的可持续性。
best_quote_en: The word that best describes what he wants is one that he’s used, which is that he wants Saudi Arabia to be a normal country.
best_quote_zh: 最能描述他愿望的词，也是他自己使用的，就是他希望沙特成为一个正常的国家。

title: The Creative Architect / How to Talk to Girls at Parties
title_zh: 创意建筑师 / 如何在派对上与女孩交谈
summary_en: The Creative Architect revisits a fascinating 1958-59 study of mid-century architects, revealing insights into creativity through psychological testing. While it doesn't offer practical creativity recipes, it provides an inspiring historical perspective on creative minds. How to Talk to Girls at Parties is a clever graphic novel adaptation of Neil Gaiman's story, blending humor and sci-fi to explore adolescent awkwardness in social situations. Both works offer unique perspectives on human behavior and creativity, though in very different contexts. The architect study provides historical depth, while Gaiman's work offers contemporary social commentary through fantasy.
summary_zh: 《创意建筑师》回顾了1958-59年对中世纪建筑师的心理学研究，揭示了创造力的独特见解。虽然它没有提供实用的创造力食谱，但为创造性头脑提供了富有启发的历史视角。这本关于如何在派对上与女孩交谈的图画小说是尼尔·盖曼故事的巧妙改编，将幽默和科幻结合起来，探索了社交场合中的青少年尴尬。这两部作品从不同的角度提供了对人类行为和创造力的独特见解。建筑师研究提供了历史深度，而盖曼的作品则通过幻想提供了当代社会评论。
best_quote_en: 'What propels creativity is the unfettered expression of the self'
best_quote_zh: 推动创造力的动力是自我无拘束的表达

title: Funding for COVID-19 Projects
title_zh: 新冠项目资助
summary_en: This post highlights a unique funding initiative targeting COVID-19 startups, focusing on practical engineering solutions like ventilator production and novel therapeutic approaches. The author's hands-on approach in seeking specific expertise for viral challenge testing demonstrates a proactive stance. The content reveals a gap in traditional funding methods and emphasizes the importance of unconventional solutions in pandemic response. It serves as both a call to action for innovators and a reminder of the critical need for grassroots support in crisis situations.
summary_zh: 这篇文章介绍了一项针对新冠项目的资助计划，重点关注通风设备生产等实用工程解决方案和创新疗法。作者通过寻求特定专业知识进行病毒挑战测试展现了积极主动的态度。内容揭示了传统资助方法的不足，强调了在疫情应对中非传统解决方案的重要性。既是对创新者的号召，也是危机中基层支持的关键提醒。
best_quote_en: I think we will soon have enough testing capacity, so now I’d like to start funding more startups working on novel approaches to vaccines and therapeutics.
best_quote_zh: 我认为我们很快会有足够的检测能力，现在我想开始资助更多从事新型疫苗和治疗方法的初创企业。

title: How Your Thoughts Are Built & How You Can Shape Them | Dr. Jennifer Groh
title_zh: 如何构建你的思维并如何塑造它们 | 詹妮弗·格罗医生
summary_en: Dr. Jennifer Groh's discussion on how our brains integrate sights and sounds to shape thoughts offers profound insights into cognitive function and personal development. She reveals that focusing on specific stimuli can rewire neural circuits, influencing both immediate and future thought patterns. The conversation extends to practical applications for improving focus, happiness, and task management, highlighting tools like bone conduction headphones and mental interval training. Groh's exploration of sensory integration and attention mechanics provides a scientific foundation for understanding and enhancing cognitive processes, making this content invaluable for those seeking to optimize their mental performance and well-being.
summary_zh: 詹妮弗·格罗医生探讨大脑如何整合视觉和听觉以塑造思维，揭示专注特定刺激可重塑神经回路，影响当下及未来的思维模式。对话延伸至提升专注力、幸福感和任务管理的实用方法，强调骨传导耳机等工具。她对感官整合与注意力机制的深入探讨，为理解和优化认知过程提供了科学依据，对希望提升心理表现和幸福感的读者极具价值。
best_quote_en: What you focus on determines your thoughts, not just in that moment but your future thoughts too.
best_quote_zh: 你关注的事物决定了你的思维，不仅是当下，更影响未来的思考方向。

title: What’s in my NOW? — Molly Harris
title_zh: What’s in my NOW? — Molly Harris
summary_en: Molly Harris shares a personal and insightful look into her toolkit for managing physical discomfort, digital organization, and emotional well-being. Her recommendations range from practical gadgets like a digital hygrometer to digital tools like Inoreader and Tetr.io, which she uses to manage stress and trauma. The inclusion of the Persian proverb 'This too shall pass' adds a philosophical layer to her practical advice, emphasizing the transient nature of both good and bad experiences. This piece offers a unique blend of personal anecdotes, product recommendations, and psychological insights, making it valuable for those seeking both practical solutions and emotional resilience strategies.
summary_zh: 莫莉·哈里斯分享了她管理身体不适、数字组织和情绪健康的工具包。她的推荐从实用的数字湿度计到用于管理压力和创伤的数字工具如Inoreader和Tetr.io。波斯谚语“此事终将过去”为她的实用建议增添了哲学层面，强调了美好和不好的时刻都是短暂的。这篇文章结合了个人轶事、产品推荐和心理洞见，对寻求实用解决方案和情绪韧性的读者很有价值。
best_quote_en: “This too shall pass.”
best_quote_zh: “此事终将过去。”

title: 分享6个让我学习效率产生质变的方法
title_zh: 分享6个让我学习效率产生质变的方法
summary_en: This article presents six transformative learning efficiency methods that have significantly improved the author's lifelong learning journey. The strategies emphasize active engagement, such as participatory learning where the brain is actively involved in processing information, and cultivating the habit of manual research to build valuable information channels. The author advocates for switching between different subjects to refresh the brain and leaving time for mental processing. Additionally, utilizing fragmented time for recall and organization, and adopting a self-centered learning approach where one actively seeks answers to personal questions are highlighted. The methods are practical, data-driven, and rooted in cognitive science, offering actionable insights for anyone looking to enhance their learning efficiency.
summary_zh: 这篇文章分享了六种提升学习效率的方法，这些方法在作者的终身学习过程中产生了显著影响。策略强调主动参与，如参与式学习让大脑积极处理信息，以及培养动手检索的习惯以建立有价值的信息渠道。作者提倡在不同学科间切换以刷新大脑，并留出时间让大脑放空处理信息。此外，利用碎片时间进行回忆和梳理，以及采用以自我为中心的学习方式，主动寻求解决个人问题的答案。这些方法实用且基于认知科学，为希望提升学习效率的人提供了可行的见解。
best_quote_en: The process of learning is not about the information you acquire, but the thoughts and reflections it inspires in your mind.
best_quote_zh: 学习的过程中，你学到的东西其实不是最重要的，你脑海中产生的想法和思考，才是最重要的。

title: Petrolette: women in motorcycle culture – in pictures
title_zh: Petrolette：女性摩托车文化——图片展
summary_en: Lucia Braham's decade-long documentation of women in motorcycle culture reveals a vibrant, supportive community that challenges traditional gender norms. Her work captures the camaraderie, empowerment, and adventure that define this subculture, from female-only events like Dream Roll to grassroots initiatives like Sheila's Shakedown. The photographs not only showcase technical skill but also tell stories of personal growth, community building, and the sheer joy of riding. Braham's project transcends mere documentation, becoming a testament to female resilience and the power of shared passion. It invites viewers to reconsider preconceptions about motorcycle culture and appreciate its inclusive, empowering aspects.
summary_zh: 卢西亚·布拉姆通过10年的拍摄记录，揭示了女性摩托车文化中充满活力的支持性社群。她的作品捕捉到了女性独有的摩托车营地、自发组织的活动以及骑行乐趣。这些照片不仅展现了技术技巧，更讲述了个人成长、社群建设和骑行带来的快乐。布拉姆的项目超越了单纯记录，成为女性韧性和共同热情力量的见证，挑战了对摩托车文化的传统认知。
best_quote_en: 'This is a female-only motorcycle camp out in Washington State, USA. I took a risk and attended the first one the year before, not knowing a single person. I left that year with lifelong friendships.'
best_quote_zh: “这是美国华盛顿州的女性独有摩托车露营活动。我冒险参加了前一年的第一届，当时我不认识任何人。但那一年我离开时带走了终生的友谊。”

title: Investor Herd Dynamics
title_zh: 投资者群体效应
summary_en: This insightful essay explores the fascinating dynamics of investor herd mentality in startup funding. The author reveals how investor opinions are significantly influenced by other investors' opinions, creating exponential growth potential but also potential pitfalls. Key insights include how fundraising success makes startups better investments by reducing risk and increasing valuation, how founder confidence impacts investor perception, and the challenges of dealing with mediocre investors who follow the herd. The piece offers practical advice on navigating these dynamics, including how to handle investor inquiries about other offers without manipulation. It's a must-read for founders seeking to understand the psychological and practical aspects of startup funding.
summary_zh: 这篇文章深入剖析了创投融资中的投资者群体效应。作者揭示了投资者决策如何受他人影响，既带来指数级增长潜力，也潜藏风险。核心观点包括融资成功如何降低风险并提升估值，创始人自信如何影响投资者判断，以及如何应对跟风投资者的挑战。文章提供了实用建议，教创业者在维护谈判诚信的同时应对投资者提问。对希望理解创投心理学和实战策略的创业者非常有价值。
best_quote_en: The biggest component in most investors' opinion of you is the opinion of other investors.
best_quote_zh: 大多数投资者对你的评价中，最大的组成部分是其他投资者的评价。

title: Dick Cheney’s Long, Strange Goodbye
title_zh: 迪克·切尼的漫长告别
summary_en: This article offers a profound reflection on the political schisms of our time through the lens of Dick Cheney's funeral. The presence of figures like Rachel Maddow alongside Washington elites underscores the bizarre alliances forged in Trump's America. Cheney's legacy remains deeply contentious, yet his opposition to Trump unites diverse political figures. The article contrasts Cheney's principled stance against Trump with his own controversial history, particularly the Iraq War. The funeral becomes a microcosm of our polarized politics, where even in death, Cheney's choices continue to divide. The juxtaposition of Trump's violent rhetoric on social media with the solemn funeral service creates a stark commentary on the state of American democracy. The piece ultimately questions what we remember and why, in an era where political realities seem to defy historical precedent.
summary_zh: 这篇文章通过迪克·切尼的葬礼，深刻反映了当今政治的分裂。雷切尔·马多在场这一奇景，凸显了特朗普时代怪异的政治联盟。切尼的遗产仍然充满争议，但他反对特朗普的立场却团结了各方政治人物。文章将切尼反特朗普的立场与他本人争议重重的历史，尤其是伊拉克战争，形成鲜明对比。葬礼成了我们政治分裂的缩影，即使在切尼去世后，他的选择仍在继续撕裂我们。特朗普在社交媒体上发出的暴力言论与肃穆的葬礼礼仪形成强烈对比，成为对美国民主现状的尖锐评述。文章最终质问：在政治现实似乎颠覆历史常识的时代，我们究竟记得什么，又为什么记住？
best_quote_en: "He can never be trusted with power again," the former Vice-President warned when he endorsed Harris.
best_quote_zh: 前副总统在支持哈里斯时警告说：“他永远不能再被赋予权力。”

title: Pricier Mexican Residency/SteriPEN Ultralight/Expat Issue Discussions
title_zh: 墨西哥居留许可费用翻倍/便携式紫外线消毒器SteriPEN/数字游民讨论
summary_en: This article offers a mix of practical travel advice and social commentary on expat life. The discussion about Mexico's residency fee increases highlights the financial implications for Americans seeking to relocate, while the SteriPEN recommendation provides a sustainable solution for safe water consumption. The podcast segment offers valuable insights into the realities of digital nomad life, and the piece on problematic expats serves as a cautionary tale about cultural adaptation. Together, these sections create a compelling narrative about the challenges and considerations of international relocation and long-term travel.
summary_zh: 本文结合了实用旅行建议与海外生活的社会评论。墨西哥居留费用上涨的讨论凸显了美国人移居的财务影响，SteriPEN的推荐则提供了安全饮水的可持续解决方案。播客部分深入探讨了数字游民生活的真实情况，而关于不良外籍人士的内容则是文化适应的警示故事。这些片段共同构成了关于国际迁移与长期旅行挑战的引人深思的叙事。
best_quote_en: Some people really aren’t meant to move abroad. Some want to shut the door behind them, keeping out 'the others.'
best_quote_zh: 有些人根本不适合移居海外。有些人想关上身后的门，把'其他人'拒之门外。

title: The Virus
title_zh: 病毒
summary_en: This piece offers a sobering perspective on the COVID-19 pandemic, emphasizing its potential global impact and serving as a wake-up call for future preparedness. The author highlights the need for societal changes, both temporary and permanent, while warning about the fragility of our economic systems. The advice to young people to avoid infection underscores the collective responsibility in preventing the spread. Most intriguing is the framing of COVID-19 as a 'warm-up' for potentially worse pandemics, challenging us to rethink our global health infrastructure and emergency response capabilities.
summary_zh: 这篇文章以严肃的视角分析了COVID-19大流行的潜在全球影响，并将其视为未来做好准备的警示。作者强调了社会变革的必要性，包括临时和永久性的变化，同时警示我们经济体系的脆弱性。建议年轻人避免感染，凸显了集体责任在防止疫情传播中的重要性。最引人深思的是将COVID-19视为更严重大流行的前奏，挑战我们重新思考全球卫生基础设施和应急响应能力。
best_quote_en: Covid-19 is bad, but only a warm-up. I think it’s unlikely that this is the worst new pandemic we’ll see in our lifetimes.
best_quote_zh: COVID-19很严重，但只是预演。我认为这可能不是我们这一生中将要面对的最严重的新流行病。

title: Fat, fearless and over 50. Thanks to my TikTok outfit posts, I feel powerful and seen | Jen Walshaw
title_zh: 年过五十，肥胖却无所畏惧：感谢TikTok穿搭分享，我感到充满力量并被看见
summary_en: This deeply personal essay by Jen Walshaw offers a poignant reflection on how TikTok, initially a small act of self-care post-illness, transformed into a powerful platform for self-acceptance and community building.
